#summary Introduction to the JMCNet Full MongoDB Flex Driver.

<wiki:toc max_depth="1" />

= Introduction =

This project aims to provide to the community a full and reliable Flex Driver for [http://www.mongodb.org/ MongoDB]. Some others initiatives exists, but I found it unusable in a professional environment. 


= Details =

Main features are :
  # Connexion pooling,
  # Safe mode enabling,
  # Direct CRUD object manipulation,
  # Full Aggregation support (group, MapReduce, ...),
  # BSON encoder and decoder,
  # ObjectID helper.

= Quick index =
  * Installation,
  * Driver initialization,
  * Collection manipulation (create, drop),
  * Running commands,
  * CRUD (Create, Retrieve, Update, Delete),
  * Querying (Find, FindOne, getMore, killCursor),
  * Count,
  * Distinct,
  * Group,
  * MapReduce,
